add_auth_error: Something went wrong while adding the user.
check_admin_status_fail: failed to check the assistant's admin status: %v
check_user_status_fail: [TelegramCalls - joinAssistant] Failed to check the user's status: %v
choose_lang: Please choose a language from the buttons below.

⚠️ Failed to download the song.
Skipping to the next track...
download_failed_skip:
⚠️ Failed to download the song: (%v)
Skipping to the next track...
filter_bot_admin_status_failed: ⚠️ Failed to get bot admin status (cache or fetch failed).
filter_bot_no_invite_permission: ⚠️ bot doesn’t have permission to invite users.
filter_bot_not_admin:
❌ bot is not admin in this chat.

filter_bot_not_admin_reload:
❌ bot is not admin in this chat.
Use /reload to refresh admin cache.
filter_not_admin: ❌ You are not an admin in this chat.
filter_not_authorized: ❌ You are not an authorized user in this chat.
filter_not_authorized_command: You are not authorized to use this command.
get_invite_link_fail: failed to get the invite link: %v
help_admin_content: 🎛 Playback Controls: • /skip — Skip current track • /pause — Pause playback • /resume — Resume playback • /seek [sec] — Jump to a position 📋 Queue Management: • /remove [x] — Remove track number x • /loop [0-10] — Repeat queue x times 👑 Permissions: • /auth [reply] — Grant approval • /unauth [reply] — Revoke authorization • /authlist — View authorized users
help_devs_content: 📊 System Tools: • /stats — Show usage stats 🧹 Maintenance: • /av — Show active voice chats
help_user_content: ▶️ Playback: • /play [song] — Play audio in VC 🛠 Utilities: • /start — Intro message • /privacy — Privacy policy • /queue — View track queue
incoming_call: Are you calling me? Let me play a song for you...
invalid_seek: invalid seek position or duration. The position must be positive and the duration must be greater than 0
invalid_speed: invalid speed: the value must be between 0.5 and 4.0
invalid_user_peer: user peer is not a valid user
invite_link_expired: the invite link has expired, or my assistant (%d) is banned from this group
join_request_already_sent: my assistant (%d) has already requested to join this group
lang_no_permission: You are not authorized to change the language in this chat.
loop_invalid_count: ❌ Invalid loop count provided. Please use a number between 0 and 10.
loop_out_of_range: ⚠️ The loop count must be between 0 and 10.
loop_set: The loop has been set to %d time(s)
loop_usage: 🔁 Loop Control Usage: /loop [count] • 0 to disable loop • 1-10 to set the loop count
mute_error: ❌ An error occurred while muting the playback: %s
pause_error: ❌ An error occurred while pausing the playback: %s
play_file_too_large: ❌ File size is too large. The maximum allowed size is %d MB.
play_invalid_reply: ❌ The replied-to message is not valid.
play_invalid_tg_link: ❌ The provided Telegram link is invalid.
play_invalid_url: ❌ Invalid URL or unsupported platform. Supported Platforms: - YouTube - Spotify - JioSaavn - Apple Music
play_no_results: 😕 No results found. Please try a different search query.
play_no_tracks_found: ❌ No tracks were found for the provided source.
play_queue_full: ⚠️ The queue is full (10 tracks max). Use /end to clear it.
play_queue_summary: 📋 Total in Queue: %d ⏱ Total Duration: %s 👤 Requested by: %s
play_track_already_in_queue: ✅ This track is already in the queue or currently playing.
play_usage: 🎵 Usage: /play [song name or URL] Supported Platforms: - YouTube - Spotify - JioSaavn - Apple Music
privacy_policy: Privacy Policy for %s: 1. Data Storage: - %s does not store any personal data on the user's device. - We do not collect or store any data about your device or personal browsing activity. 2. What We Collect: - We only collect your Telegram user ID and chat ID to provide the music streaming and interaction functionalities of the bot. - No personal data such as your name, phone number, or location is collected. 3. Data Usage: - The collected data (Telegram UserID, ChatID) is used strictly to provide the music streaming and interaction functionalities of the bot. - We do not use this data for any marketing or commercial purposes. 4. Data Sharing: - We do not share any of your personal or chat data with any third parties, organizations, or individuals. - No sensitive data is sold, rented, or traded to any outside entities. 5. Data Security: - We take reasonable security measures to protect the data we collect. This includes standard practices like encryption and safe storage. - However, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data, as no online service is 100%% secure. 6. Cookies and Tracking: - %s does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies to collect personal information or track your behavior. 7. Third-Party Services: - %s does not integrate with any third-party services that collect or process your personal information, aside from Telegram's own infrastructure. 8. Your Rights: - You have the right to request the deletion of your data. Since we only store your Telegram ID and chat ID temporarily to function properly, these can be removed upon request. - You may also revoke access to the bot at any time by removing or blocking it from your chats. 9. Changes to the Privacy Policy: - We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated through updates within the bot. 10. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, feel free to contact us at Support Group ────────────────── Note: This privacy policy is in place to help you understand how your data is handled and to ensure that your experience with %s is safe and respectful.
queue_finished: 🎵 The queue has finished. Use /play to add more songs!
queue_no_session: ⏸ There is no active playback session.
queue_short_summary: 🎧 Queue for %s ▶️ Now Playing: ├ %s └ %s/%s min 📊 Total: %d track(s) in the queue
reload_cooldown: ⏳ Please wait %s before using this command again.
reload_error: ⚠️ An error occurred while reloading the admin cache.
reload_success: ✅ The admin cache has been successfully reloaded.
remove_auth_error: Something went wrong while removing the user.
remove_invalid_number: ⚠️ Please enter a valid track number.
remove_out_of_range: ⚠️ The track number is not valid. Please choose a number between 1 and %d.
remove_usage: ❌ Remove Track Usage: /remove [track number] - Use 1 to remove the first track, 2 for the second, and so on.
resume_error: ❌ An error occurred while resuming the playback: %s
seek_beyond_duration: ⚠️ You cannot seek beyond the track's duration. The maximum seek time is %s.
seek_error: ❌ An error occurred while seeking the track: %s
seek_fetch_duration_error: ❌ An error occurred while fetching the current track duration.
seek_invalid_time: ❌ Invalid seek time provided. Please use a valid number of seconds.
seek_min_time: ⚠️ The minimum seek time is 20 seconds.
seek_success: ✅ The track has been seeked to %s.
settings_no_permission: You don't have permission to change settings.
speed_error: ❌ An error occurred while changing the speed: %s
speed_invalid_value: ❌ Invalid speed value provided. Please use a number between 0.5 and 4.0.
speed_out_of_range: ⚠️ The speed must be between 0.5 and 4.0.
speed_success: ✅ The playback speed has been changed to %.2fx.
speed_usage: ❌ Change Speed Usage: /speed [value] - The speed can be set from 0.5 to 4.0.
start_text:
ʜᴇʏ %s;

◎ ᴛʜɪꜱ ɪꜱ %s!
➻ ᴀ ꜰᴀꜱᴛ & ᴘᴏᴡᴇʀꜰᴜʟ ᴛᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ ᴍᴜꜱɪᴄ ᴘʟᴀʏᴇʀ ʙᴏᴛ.

ꜱᴜᴘᴘᴏʀᴛᴇᴅ ᴘʟᴀᴛꜰᴏʀᴍꜱ: ʏᴏᴜᴛᴜʙᴇ, ꜱᴘᴏᴛɪꜰʏ, ᴀᴘᴘʟᴇ ᴍᴜꜱɪᴄ, ꜱᴏᴜɴᴅᴄʟᴏᴜᴅ.

---
◎ ᴄʟɪᴄᴋ ᴏɴ ʜᴇʟᴘ ʙᴜᴛᴛᴏɴ ꜰᴏʀ ɪɴꜰᴏ.
stop_error: ❌ An error occurred while stopping the playback: %s
stop_success: ⏹️ Playback has been stopped by %s, and the queue has been cleared.
supergroup_command_only: This command can only be used in a supergroup.
unban_fail_bot_not_admin: cannot unban or unmute the assistant (%d) because it is banned or restricted, and the bot lacks admin privileges
unban_fail_no_admin: cannot unban the assistant (%d) because it is banned from this group, and I am not an admin
unban_fail_no_perm: cannot unban or unmute the assistant (%d) because it is banned or restricted, and the bot lacks the necessary admin privileges
unmute_error: ❌ An error occurred while unmuting the playback: %s
user_authed: ✅ User (%d) has been successfully granted authorization permissions.
user_unauthed: ✅ User (%d) has been successfully removed from the authorized users list.
watcher_assistant_banned: 🚫 My assistant has been banned from this chat. All ongoing music playback and related data have been stopped and cleared. If this was a mistake, please unban %d to continue using the music features. 🎶
watcher_not_supergroup: This chat (%d) is not a supergroup yet. ⚠️ Please convert this chat to a supergroup and add me as admin. If you don't know how to convert, use this guide: 🔗 https://te.legra.ph/How-to-Convert-a-Group-to-a-Supergroup-01-02 If you have any questions, join our support group:
watcher_vc_ended:
🎧 Video chat ended!
All queues cleared.
watcher_vc_started:
🎙️ Video chat started!
Use /play <song name> to play music.
